## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G09740](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G09740)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>HAC11, HAG05, HAG5, HAM2</u>
- **Gene Name:** HISTONE ACETYLTRANSFERASE OF THE CBP FAMILY 11, HISTONE ACETYLTRANSFERASE OF THE GNAT/MYST SUPERFAMILY 5, histone acetyltransferase of the MYST family 2
- **Description:**   histone acetyltransferase of the MYST family 2;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2144776
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
